snippet: After routing rebels from the town of Qusayr, the Syrian Army and Hezbollah pursued hundreds of insurgents and civilians fleeing to surrounding villages and farms.
abstract: Soldiers of Syrian Army and militant Lebanese group Hezbollah, still triumphant after routing rebels from Syrian town of Qusayr, fan out to surrounding villages and farms where fleeing insurgents and hundreds of civilians seek refuge.

byline.original: By HWAIDA SAAD and KAREEM FAHIM

lead_paragraph: After routing rebels from the town of Qusayr, the Syrian Army and Hezbollah pursued hundreds of insurgents and civilians fleeing to surrounding villages and farms.

headline.seo: Syrian Forces Pursue Insurgents Who Fled Fallen Town
headline.main: Syrian Forces Chase Rebels Who Fled Fallen Town
headline.print_headline: Syrian Forces Chase Rebels Who Fled Fallen Town
